name: Micro.io
description:
* This is a game of Faust Game Jam 2019

Project: Afrien Tsai

Art: Cvayi

Progarm: PJ Yu

Audio: Hong Taka

- - -

Use  light to induce your microorganism and win more points!

This game is based on the view of microscopes. You need to use lights to guide your microorganism and get as  many points as possible.  Items and firing are very helpful, also, don't forget to utilize the ability of your microorganism!

 * This is a 2-player pvp  PC game

 * Please play this game under 1920*1080 resolution

Hope you enjoy! :)
